ability.desc: Drag this Tome to the Shop to open an Armory full of emblems! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
ability.name: Tome of Traits

ability.desc: Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of completed items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
ability.name: Completed Item Anvil

ability.desc: Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of component items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
ability.name: Component Anvil

ability.desc: Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of Artifact items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
ability.name: Artifact Item Anvil

ability.desc: Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of Support items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
ability.name: Support item anvil

ability.desc: This chest stores all of the accumulated loot you've collected. Win a combat against a player to open it!
ability.name: Mercenary Chest

ability.desc: Slam the target dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.
ability.name: Sentinel Smash

ability.desc: Zed throws a shuriken in a line, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in its path.
ability.name: Razor Shuriken

ability.desc:
Ahri casts out an orb, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies it passes through.

It then returns to her, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ true damage to all enemies it passes through.
ability.name: Orb of Deception

ability.desc: Garen spins his sword for @SpinDuration@ seconds, becoming immune to magic damage and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to nearby enemies over the duration.
ability.name: Judgement

ability.desc:
Akali throws kunai at her target, dealing 150 %i:scaleAP% magic damage.
There is a 25% %i:scaleCrit% chance that this spell will critically strike for 225 %i:scaleCritMult% magic damage instead.
ability.name: Five Point Strike

ability.desc: Warwick leaps to the enemy with the lowest percent Health, stunning them, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage, and healing himself for @HealPercent@% of the damage over @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Infinite Duress

ability.desc: Ashe fires an arrow at the farthest enemy. It stops on the first target hit, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and stunning them for @StunDurationPerSquare@ seconds per hex traveled.
ability.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow

ability.desc:
Blitzcrank pulls the furthest enemy to him, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.

His next attack after pulling knocks up for 1 second.

Allies within range will prioritize attacking Blitzcrank's target.
ability.name: Rocket Grab

ability.desc: Vi charges at the farthest enemy, knocking aside and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies along the way. When she reaches her target, she deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and knocks them up for @CCDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Cease and Desist

ability.desc: Lulu makes @Targets@ allies giant, granting them @ModifiedBonusHealth@ bonus health and knocking up adjacent enemies near them for @CCDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Wild Growth

ability.desc: Pyke leaves a phantom at his location, then dashes behind the farthest enemy. After @StunDelay@ second, his phantom returns to Pyke, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies it passes through and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Phantom Undertow

ability.desc: Lucian dashes away from his current target, then attacks them and fires a second shot which deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Relentless Pursuit

ability.desc: Kha'Zix slashes the nearest enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage. If the enemy has no adjacent teammates, this damage is increased to @ModifiedIsolationDamage@.
ability.name: Taste their Fear

ability.desc:
Lissandra encases a random enemy in ice, stunning them for @EnemyStunDuration@ seconds and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies @MaxHexRange@ hexes around the target.

If Lissandra's Health is below @SelfUltPercentage@ she will instead encase herself for @SelfDuration@ seconds and become untargetable.
ability.name: Frozen Tomb

ability.desc: Braum puts up his shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds, absorbing and stopping all incoming missiles and reducing his damage taken from that direction by @ShieldDR@%.
ability.name: Unbreakable

ability.desc:
Camille singles out and leaps on an enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and rooting them for @Duration@ seconds.

Allies within range will prioritize attacking Camille's target.
ability.name: The Hextech Ultimatum

ability.desc: Darius swings his axe in a circle, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and healing himself for @ModifiedHeal@ health for each enemy hit.
ability.name: Decimate

ability.desc: Veigar blasts a random enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage. If Veigar is a higher star level than his target they are instantly killed instead.
ability.name: Primordial Burst

ability.desc:
Elise transforms into a giant spider and summons @NumSpiderlings@ spiderlings to fight alongside her.

While in spider form, Elise gains @LifestealPercent@ bonus Lifesteal. Spiderlings benefit from active Demon trait bonuses.
ability.name: Spider Form

ability.desc:
Fiora reveals four Vitals on an enemy champion before becoming untargetable as she strikes each once in rapid succession.

Each strike deals @PercentAD*100@% of her Attack Damage as physical damage (Total: @TotalDamage@), @ModifiedBonusDamage@ bonus true damage, and heals her for @PercentHealing*100@% of the total damage dealt.
ability.name: Blade Waltz

ability.desc:
Evelynn deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to up to 3 nearby enemies, then teleports away.

This damage is increased to @ModifiedCritDamage@ against targets below @ExecuteThreshholdPercent@ health.
ability.name: Last Caress

ability.desc:
Passive: Gangplank periodically places barrels near enemies.

Active: Gangplank shoots his barrels, causing them all to explode, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to nearby enemies and applying on-hit effects.
ability.name: Powder Kegs

ability.desc: Passive: Whenever Vayne attacks the same target 3 times, she deals @ModifiedDamage@ of her target's maximum Health as true damage.
ability.name: Silver Bolts

ability.desc: Varus channels for 1.5 seconds, then fires a piercing arrow, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in its path.
ability.name: Piercing Arrow

ability.desc: Passive: Graves' basic attacks deal 5% %i:scaleAD% bonus physical damage and hit all enemies in a cone in front of him. Graves applies on-hit effects to all enemies hit.
ability.name: Buckshot

ability.desc:
Jayce knocks a nearby enemy away, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and stunning them for @CCDuration@ seconds. He then transforms into cannon form and gains max attack speed for his next @AAMax@ attacks.

While in cannon form, Jayce's attack range is increased by 3 hexes.
ability.name: Mercury Cannon

ability.desc:
Passive: Jinx gets excited as she helps take down enemy units.

After her first takedown, Jinx gains @PercentAttackSpeed@ bonus Attack Speed.

After her second takedown, Jinx swaps to her rocket launcher, causing her attacks to deal @ModifiedDamage@ bonus magic damage to all enemies in a small area around her target.
ability.name: Get Excited!

ability.desc:
Twisted Fate randomly picks a card, then throws it at his current target, dealing @ModifiedRedCardDamage@ magic damage and creating a special effect based on the color of the card.

Blue: Restores @BlueCardManaRestore@ mana to all allies adjacent to Twisted Fate.
Red: Deals @ModifiedRedCardDamage@ to all enemies adjacent to the target.
Gold: Stuns the target for @GoldCardStunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Pick a Card

ability.desc:
Tristana places a bomb on her current target which will detonate after she attacks them 3 times or @ExplosiveChargeDuration@ seconds pass without Tristana attacking them.

When the bomb detonates, it deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all nearby enemies, plus @PercentDamageIncrease@ for each attack, up to a maximum of @ModifiedMaxDamage@.
ability.name: Explosive Charge

ability.desc: Passive: Kassadin's attacks steal @ManaSteal@ mana from his target and grant him a @ModifiedShield@ damage shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Nether Blade

ability.desc: Katarina channels for @Duration@ seconds, throwing knives at @NumberOfTargets@ nearby enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage over the duration and reducing healing by 50% to her targets for @GrievousWoundsDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Death Lotus

ability.desc: Kayle shields her @Targets@ weakest allies, making them immune to all damage for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Divine Judgement

ability.desc: Shen creates a zone around himself for @ZoneDuration@ seconds, granting all nearby allies 100% chance to dodge incoming attacks.
ability.name: Spirit's Refuge

ability.desc:
Nidalee heals herself and an ally, restoring @ModifiedHeal@ health over @HoTDuration@ seconds, then transforms into cat form.

While in cat form, Nidalee's range is reduced to 1 hex and she gains @ADinCougar@ bonus Attack Damage.
ability.name: Primal Surge

ability.desc:
Rek'Sai burrows, becoming untargetable for @BurrowDuration@ second and healing for @ModifiedHeal@ health.

She emerges at her target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and knocking them up for @KnockupDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Burrow

ability.desc: Leona calls down a solar ray in an area, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies within and reducing their Move Speed by 50% for @CCDuration@ seconds. The enemy in the center of the ray is also stunned for @CCDuration@ seconds.

Passive: Justice never rests! Galio is unstoppable and immune to crowd control effects.

Galio slams down with divine might dealing @ModifiedDamage@ true damage to all enemies.

traits.desc: (@MinUnits@) Robots start combat at full Mana.

traits.desc:
Innate: When combat starts, Assassins leap to the enemy backline.

Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage and Chance.

(@MinUnits@) +@CritAmpPercent@% Critical Strike Damage & +@CritChanceAmpPercent@% Critical Strike Chance

ability.desc: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the current target.

After a second takedown, swap to the rocket launcher, causing attacks to deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> bonus magic damage to all enemies in a small area.

ability.desc: Toss 3 traps around the nearest enemy. When an enemy nears a trap (or after @DetonationDelay@ seconds) it explodes, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> damage to nearby enemies and slowing their movement speed for @SlowDuration@ seconds.

ability.desc: Teleport to the furthest enemy in range. Stun them for @StunDuration@ seconds and attack them <TFTBonus>@ModifiedAttacks@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> times.

ability.desc: <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Start of combat: gain <TFTBonus>@TooltipShield@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%)</TFTBonus> Shield.

ability.desc: For @Duration@ seconds, gain increased Move Speed and attacks deal <trueDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</trueDamage> bonus true damage. While active, heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> Health every second.

ability.desc: Launch <scaleLevel>@InitialFighters@</scaleLevel> fighters that fly out to random enemies, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and draining <scaleLevel>@ManaDrain@</scaleLevel> Mana, and then return. Subsequent casts launch all returned fighters, plus @FightersPerCast@ additional.

ability.desc: Fire a drill toward the farthest enemy and reel in the first enemy hit over <scaleLevel>@ChannelDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds. Once reeled in, repeatedly deal <trueDamage>@TrueDamage@</trueDamage> true damage very quickly until they die. After his first successful cast, the Mana cost of this ability is reduced by <TFTBonus>@ModifiedManaCostReduction@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus>.

ability.desc:
Freeze all units in time before attacking @NumAttacks@ times dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage. Each strike targets the highest Attack Speed enemy and Chills them for @SlowDuration@ seconds.

ability.desc: Charge the farthest enemy, knocking aside and dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to all enemies along the way. When the target is reached, deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedPrimaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and Stun them for <scaleLevel>@CCDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds.

ability.desc: Dash to the current target and deal <physicalDamage>@TooltipDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage. If this kills the target, cast again immediately at the enemy with the highest Mana.

ability.desc: Throw the buckler at the furthest enemy that deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. When it bounces back, gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield.

ability.desc: Heal your team for <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth>.

ability.desc: Fire an orb in a line, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to all enemies it passes through. It returns dealing <trueDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</trueDamage> true damage to all enemies it passes through.

ability.desc:
Pull in all orbs on the battlefield and create @Spheres@ new ones, then fire them all at the enemy with the highest percent Health, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage per orb.

Lowest total Health breaks targeting ties.

ability.desc: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to all nearby enemies and Stun them for <scaleLevel>@StunDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds.

ability.desc:
Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. If this kills the target, immediately cast this again.

ability.desc: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

ability.desc: For the next @ScaledDuration@ seconds, attacks instead throw 2 Meeps, each dealing <physicalDamage>@ModifiedPhysicalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage and <magicDamage>@ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.
ability.name: Meep Meep!

ability.desc: Fire a bullet towards the farthest enemy, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the first enemy hit.
ability.name: Ace in the Hole

ability.desc:
Gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds and breathe a cone of fire, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage, Burning, and Wounding enemies hit for @BurnWoundDuration@ seconds.

Burn: Deal 1% of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%
ability.name: Eruption

ability.desc: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies. For the next @Duration@ seconds, attacks deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamageOnHit@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> bonus magic damage.
ability.name: Decimate

ability.desc:
Taunt enemies within @HexRadius@ hexes and gain @ModifiedArmor@ (%i:scaleArmor%) Armor and @ModifiedMagicResist@ (%i:scaleMR%) Magic Resist for @Duration@ seconds. Galio is immobile and unstoppable during this time.

After, deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all enemies in range and grant @ModifiedShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield to allies in range for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

Taunt: enemies that are able and in range must attack the taunter
ability.name: Savior's Protection

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @Duration@ seconds. Garen's next attack deals <physicalDamage>@AdditionalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage.
ability.name: Courage

ability.desc: Create an expanding paint pool around the most units that heals allies within for <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHealing@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> Health every second for 3 seconds. After 3 seconds, it explodes, healing allies within for <scaleHealth>@ModifiedEndHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> Health and dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies.
ability.name: A Brush with Fate

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield and summon a tentacle near the current target for @Duration@ seconds. The tentacle slams every second, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage in a line and healing Illaoi for <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHealAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> Health.
ability.name: Prophet of Spirits

ability.desc:
Passive: Attacks send blades that dart between enemies, dealing @Damage_BladeHit@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and 30% Sunder for @SunderDuration@ seconds. Cast every @AttacksToCast_MustMatchResourceMaximum@ attacks.

Active: Command the blades to swiftly strike the three lowest Health enemies, dealing @Damage_SpellHit@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

Irelia converts @AttackSpeedToBladeSpeed*100@% of bonus attack speed into faster blade movement, and @AttackSpeedToDamage*100@% into Attack Damage.

Sunder: Reduce Armor
ability.name: Blade Dance

ability.desc: Grant <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield to the @NumShieldTargets@ lowest Health allies for @Duration@ seconds. Then, deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the @NumTargets@ nearest enemies.
ability.name: Heavenly Winds

ability.desc: Fire @NumHits_Do_NOT_Change@ waves at the current target over @SpellDurationTOOLTIPONLY@ seconds, each dealing <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the first enemy hit. If an enemy is hit by @HitThreshold@ waves, they take <physicalDamage>@AmplifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> damage per wave instead.
ability.name: Inkstorm

ability.desc:
On first cast, transform, dealing @TotalTransformDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to nearby enemies. While transformed, gain @CritChance*100@% Critical Strike Chance and critical attacks damage adjacent enemies. If the spin only hits one enemy, the damage is increased by @SingleTargetDamageAmp*100@%.

Subsequent casts deal @TotalSwipeDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to units in a line through the target instead.
ability.name: Shadow Assassin

ability.desc: Leap towards the lowest Health enemy within 3 hexes and deal <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage.
ability.name: Leap!

ability.desc:
Dash away from the current target and deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to them and @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the nearest enemy.

Fated Bonus: Gain @FatedAS*100@% Attack Speed.
ability.name: Flourish of Arrows

ability.desc: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the lowest Health enemy within range. Every @NumCasts@ casts, gain +<TFTBonus>@AttackRangeIncrease@</TFTBonus> Attack Range.
ability.name: Raining Artillery

ability.desc:
Kick the target's spirit out of their body, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAS%) physical damage, @TooltipReave@% Mana Reaving them, and Stunning them. Enemies hit by the spirit take @ModifiedAOEDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAS%) physical damage. Gain @ModifiedShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

Mana Reave: Increase max Mana until the next cast
ability.name: Dragon's Dance

ability.desc:
Hurl an orb towards the current target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the first enemy hit and adjacent enemies. It continues rolling as a smaller orb, dealing @SecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies it hits.

Every third cast launches a mega orb at her target that deals @ModifiedMegaDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and splits into @NumOfOrbs@ smaller orbs that roll towards the farthest enemies.
ability.name: Eep!

ability.desc:
Steep the current target in a teapot, Stunning and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage over @Duration@ seconds. If they die, there's a @LootChancePercent@% chance that Lissandra turns them into a loot orb. (Rewards are doubled in Hyper Roll)

If the target is the last enemy remaining, kill them instantly.
ability.name: Let 'em Brew

ability.desc: Throw a spirit bunny towards the farthest enemy, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies along the way, reduced by @ReducedDamagePercent*100@% each time it hits an enemy. The first @TargetNum@ enemies hit are <TFTKeyword>Stunned</TFTKeyword> for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Bunny Binding

ability.desc: For @Duration@ seconds, gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedArmor@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Armor and attacks deal <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies in a cone.
ability.name: Topaz Skin

ability.desc:
Create a blizzard around a random enemy that deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage over @Duration@ seconds and Chills for @ChillDuration@ second.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by @TOOLTIPONLYChillAmount@%
ability.name: The Tempest's Torment

ability.desc: Hop into the air, reducing damage taken by <scaleLevel>@DR*100@%</scaleLevel> and Healing <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> Health over @BuffDuration@ seconds. After, slam down and deal <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.
ability.name: Hop Blossom

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedTotalShieldValue@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%)</TFTBonus> shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Channel and forge unstoppably over @ChannelDuration@ seconds, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies over the duration. After, toss an <TFTBonus>ephemeral Completed item</TFTBonus> to the nearest ally.

ability.desc: For @Duration@ seconds, attacks deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the target and <physicalDamage>@SecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to enemies behind them. Qiyana will dash to find the best angle.
ability.name: Supreme Display of Talent

ability.desc: Fire a laser @BonusRange@ Hexes beyond the current target, dealing <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to enemies hit. Grant <TFTBonus>@BonusAttackDamage@%</TFTBonus> Attack Damage to Senna and allies to the left and right for @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Absolution

ability.desc:
Passive: At the start of combat, squat adjacent units in the same row. Permanently gain @AttackDamagePerThreshold@% Attack Damage for each @HealthSquatThreshold@ Health squatted. Gains are doubled in Hyper Roll (Net gains: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT11_Unit_SettADGained@%)

Active: Slam the current target forward, Stunning them and dealing @TotalPrimaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage. Deal @TotalAoEDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) plus @PercentHealth*100@% of the target's maximum health as physical damage to enemies within 2.5 hexes.

Fated Bonus: Gain @FatedBonus*100@% Omnivamp.
ability.name: Light and Shadow

ability.desc: For @Duration@ seconds, reduce damage taken by <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShenSelfishReduction@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> for Shen and <TFTBonus>@ModifiedFlatDamageReduction@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> for adjacent allies. Shen's next @AttackCount@ attacks deal <trueDamage>@ModifiedTrueDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor%)</trueDamage> bonus true damage.
ability.name: Spirit's Refuge

ability.desc: Deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the current target. Every 3rd cast, instead deal <physicalDamage>@BoostedModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the current target and enemies adjacent to them, then heal for <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> Health.
ability.name: Broken Wings

ability.desc: Gain @PercentAttackDamage*100@% Attack Damage and grant @ModifiedAttackSpeed@ (%i:scaleAP%) Attack Speed to self and adjacent allies for @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: On the Hunt

ability.desc:
Passive: Each time your team loses @PercentHealthLost*100@% of their total Health, gain @APPerHealthLoss@ Ability Power for the rest of combat.

Active: Mana Reave the largest group of enemies within range. Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the center enemy and @ModifiedAoEDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies.

Mana Reave: Increase max Mana by 20% until the next cast

ability.desc: Dash around the target and slam, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and healing for @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health. Then, swipe twice, dealing @ModifiedAOEDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to nearby enemies.

ability.desc:

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleHealth%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @Duration@ seconds and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the current target. If Tahm Kench has more Health than them, deal <magicDamage>@BonusModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage instead. Otherwise, gain <TFTBonus>@BonusModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> more Shield.

ability.desc: Throw a spoiled dumpling at the nearest non-poisoned enemy, poisoning them for <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage over @Duration@ seconds.

Grant @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield to Thresh and the lowest Health ally for @ShieldDuration@ seconds and deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies adjacent to both. Thresh shares @PercentArmorAndMR*100@% of his Armor and Magic Resist with the shielded ally for @ResistShareDuration@ seconds.

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@AttackDamage*100@%</TFTBonus> Attack Damage for @Duration@ seconds. Jump on the current target and deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to adjacent enemies, before bouncing to a safe location.

ability.desc: Empower the next three attacks. The first two heal for <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> Health and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedSmallDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> bonus magic damage. The final attack deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedLargeDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and <TFTKeyword>Stuns</TFTKeyword> the target for @StunDuration@ second.

ability.desc:

Throw staff out, dealing @ModifiedStunDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the current target and Stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.

Spin, dealing @ModifiedSpinDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies within @SpinHexRange@-hex range.

ability.desc:

ability.desc:

While in spirit form, gain @ShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield and @ASBonus*100@% Attack Speed. Afterwards, Yone returns to his starting position.

Each cast this combat increases his dash range by 1 Hex.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%

ability.desc: Sap power from the @NumOfEnemies@ nearest enemies, gaining <scaleHealth>@HealthGain@</scaleHealth> max Health and dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to them over @Duration@ seconds.

ability.desc:

Summon @NumPlants@ Vine Lashers that attack the nearest enemy @NumPlantAutos@ times. Their attacks deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and Wound their targets for @WoundDuration@ seconds.

ability.desc:
Passive: Gain @PermanentHealthPerInterest@ permanent Health for each gold gained from interest. (Total: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT11_Unit_FortuneYordle_Health@)

Active: Heal @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health over @Duration@ seconds. Kobuko's next attack deals @ModifiedDamageAmount@ (%i:scaleHealth%) bonus magic damage.

In Hyper Roll, instead gain @HRHealthPerRound@ permanent Health per Round.

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@DefensesGained@</TFTBonus> Armor and Magic Resist for @Duration@ seconds. <TFTKeyword>Stun</TFTKeyword> nearby enemies for @StunDuration@ second and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.

ability.desc: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies in a semi-circle and <TFTKeyword>Stun</TFTKeyword> them for <scaleLevel>@StunDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds.

ability.desc:
Passive: Attacks deal @ModifiedOnHitDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.

Active: Fire a wave at the current target that deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all enemies hit.
ability.name: Celestial Flames

ability.desc: Throw @FeatherCount@ feathers at the @NumClosestTargets@ closest enemies, each dealing <physicalDamage>@ModifiedFeatherDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage. Then, recall the feathers, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalFeatherRecallDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to enemies they pass through.

ability.desc:
Passive: Gain @ModifiedADGain@% (%i:scaleAP%) Attack Damage upon attacking or getting hit, up to @MaxStacks@ times. (Current bonus: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT11_Gnar_CurrentADBonus@%)

Active: Fling a boulder at the current target, dealing @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to targets in a line.
ability.name: Boulder Toss

ability.desc: Dash into the largest group of enemies and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies in a @HexRange@-hex range. Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for each enemy hit for @ShieldDuration@ seconds and reduce their damage by <TFTBonus>@DamageReductionPercent*100@%</TFTBonus> for @DebuffDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Grand Entrance

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@Resists@</TFTBonus> Armor and Magic Resist for the next @Duration@ seconds. Afterwards, deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedAOEDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies. The current target takes <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and is Stunned for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Counter Strike

ability.desc: Heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@</scaleHealth> (%i:scaleAP%) Health and create a 1-hex sacred zone around Diana for @Duration@ seconds, taking <TFTBonus>@DR*100@%</TFTBonus> reduced damage from enemies outside the zone. While the zone is up, Diana's attacks deal <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> bonus magic damage.

ability.desc: Fire a beam through the current target, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedLaserDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies hit. Spawn a Guardian adjacent to the first enemy hit with <scaleHealth>@SoldierHealth@</scaleHealth> Health. The Guardian does not move or attack.
ability.name: Blight

ability.desc: Send @NumOfWaves@ shockwaves towards the most enemies in a line, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and <TFTKeyword>Stunning</TFTKeyword> all enemies hit for <scaleLevel>@StunDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds.
ability.name: Depth Charge

ability.desc:
Xayah fires feathers at the nearest enemies, dealing physical damage.

Rakan dashes towards the largest clump of units, deals magic damage to and debuffs them, and gains a shield for each enemy hit.
ability.name: Dynamic Duo

ability.desc: Sell Core to gain @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT11_Exalted_NumEXP@ XP
ability.name: Exalted Soul Core

ability.desc:
Luck per loss: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT11_Trait_FortuneLossLevels@
Luck penalty per win: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT11_Trait_FortuneWinPenalty@%
Player combats until rewards: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT11_Trait_FortuneRoundsRemaining@

Estimated Value: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT11_Trait_FortuneGoldValue@g
ability.name: Golden Tree

ability.desc: Xayah deals <physicalDamage>@LoversDamage@</physicalDamage> physical damage to all enemies hit by Rakan's ability.
ability.name: Deadly Plumage

ability.desc:
Rakan throws feathers at the @LoversTargets@ lowest Health allies, healing them for @LoversHealAmt@ Health.

This is affected by Trickshot.
ability.name: Gleaming Quill

ability.desc: Placeholder Tooltip
ability.name: Placeholder Name

traits.desc:
Upon dealing or taking damage @NumInstances@ times, Ghostly units send @NumSpectres@ spectres to haunt nearby enemies and heal @HealingPercent*100@% max Health every @TickRate@ seconds.

Haunted enemies take bonus damage for each spectre on them, and pass spectres on death.

(@MinUnits@) @DamagePercent*100@% per spectre
traits.name: Ghostly

traits.desc:
When you lose a player combat, gain Luck. The more fights in a row you lose, the more Luck you get.

Lose Luck when you win.

(@MinUnits@) Roll a die; in that many player combats, hold a Festival where you may convert your Luck into rewards.
(@MinUnits@) Heal @Heal@ player health at the start of each player combat.
@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT11_Trait_Fortune7Tooltip@

Each Festival, roll a new die.
traits.name: Fortune

traits.desc:
Change which Lover takes the field depending on whether they are placed in the front or back 2 rows.

When the fielded Lover casts, the other provides a bonus effect.

Front: Altruist Rakan
Back: Trickshot Xayah
traits.name: Lovers

traits.desc:
(@MinUnits@) Reapers' Abilities can critically strike and they gain @CritChance*100@% Critical Strike Chance.
(@MinUnits@) Additionally, Reapers bleed enemies for @BleedDamage*100@% bonus true damage over @Duration@ seconds.
traits.name: Reaper

traits.desc: Place in the back two rows to get Trickshot, place in the front two rows to get Altruist!
traits.name: Trickshot/Altruist

traits.desc:
The moon illuminates hexes, Shielding units placed in them at the start of combat.

Umbral units in illuminated hexes execute low Health enemies.

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield; @DesireExecuteThreshhold@% Health execute
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield; @DesireExecuteThreshhold@% Health execute. More hexes are illuminated
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield; @DesireExecuteThreshhold@% Health execute. Illuminate the whole board
(@MinUnits@) Executed enemies have a @DesireExecuteRewardPercent*100@% chance to drop loot; @DesireExecuteThreshhold@% Health execute
traits.name: Umbral

traits.desc:
Dryads gain Ability Power and @StartingHealth@ Health. Each enemy death grants permanent additional Health.

(@MinUnits@) @AP@ %i:scaleAP%; @HealthPerCompost@ %i:scaleHealth% per enemy death

(Total health: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_DryadHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%)
(Enemies killed: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_DryadCompost@)
traits.name: Dryad

traits.desc:
Combat start: Allies in the front 2 rows gain Omnivamp. Allies in the back 2 rows gain Ability Power.

(@MinUnits@) @Omnivamp*100@% Omnivamp, @APAmount@ %i:scaleAP%
traits.name: Sage

traits.desc:
Arcanists gain Ability Power and grant Ability Power to allies.

(@MinUnits@) @TeamAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% to all allies.
(@MinUnits@) @ArcanistAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for Arcanists; @TeamAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for others
(@MinUnits@) @ArcanistAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for Arcanists; @TeamAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for others
(@MinUnits@) @ArcanistAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for Arcanists; @TeamAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for others
traits.name: Arcanist

traits.desc:
Gain unique Inkshadow items. Inkshadow champions gain @PercentBuff@% bonus damage and damage reduction.

(@MinUnits@) @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Inkshadow_Item1@
(@MinUnits@) @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Inkshadow_Item2@ and @IncreasedPercentBuff@% more bonus damage and damage reduction
(@MinUnits@) @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Inkshadow_Item3@, @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Inkshadow_Item4@, and @IncreasedPercentBuff@% more bonus damage and damage reduction.
traits.name: Inkshadow

traits.desc:
Altruists heal the lowest Health ally for @PercentDamageToHeal*100@% of damage they deal. Your team gains Armor and Magic Resist.

(@MinUnits@) @Resists@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%
traits.name: Altruist

traits.desc:
The Artist paints the champion you place in a special bench slot. Get a 1-star copy of the champion placed there when the Artist's work is complete.

Rounds to Complete = Unit Cost
traits.name: Artist

traits.desc:
Your team gains @BaseDamageAmp@% bonus damage, plus more based on your level.

After combat, store XP in a Soul Core. Sell the Core to claim the XP.

(@MinUnits@) @DamageAmpPerLevel@% damage per level, @BaseAmountXP@ XP.
(@MinUnits@) @DamageAmpPerLevel@% damage per level, @BaseAmountXP@ XP.

(Current bonus: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Exalted_CurrentBonus@%).

Each game a different set of units is Exalted.
traits.name: Exalted

traits.desc:
Heavenly units grant unique stats to your team, increased for each Heavenly unit in play.
